pullRequest.title: Make sure all Arc build items have at least some javadoc

nodes.bodyText: AFAIK Allows to add... is not gramatically correct. A direct object is needed. E.g. Allows users to.... I prefer "Makes it possible to" ;-). Moreover, I'd avoid using "CDI components". It's a more general tool and it could be used for non-CDI classes as well.

is generally better.
I think we should add some information about when it makes sense to use that one instead of CombinedIndexBuildItem.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -8,6 +8,17 @@
 
 import io.quarkus.builder.item.SimpleBuildItem;
 
+/**
+ * Represent a Jandex {@link IndexView} on the whole deployment that has a complete CDI-related information.
+ *
+ * Compared to {@link io.quarkus.deployment.builditem.CombinedIndexBuildItem} this index can contain additional classes
+ * that were indexed while bean discovery was in progress.
+ *
+ * It also holds information about all programmatically registered beans and all generated bean classes.

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * A build item that represents fully initialized CDI bean container.
          
          
            
             * A build item that represents the fully initialized CDI bean container.

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * This item is produced as the last step in Arc bootstrap process.
          
          
            
             * This item is produced as the last step of the ArC bootstrap process.

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * Build item that registers a listener which gets notified as soon as CDI bean container is initialized.
          
          
            
             * Build item that registers a listener which gets notified as soon as the CDI bean container is initialized.

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * An instance of running {@link BeanContainer} is provided to the listener.
          
          
            
             * An instance of the running {@link BeanContainer} is provided to the listener.

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * Registers custom {@link BeanDeploymentValidator} which can either perform additional validation or enforce
          
          
            
             * Register a custom {@link BeanDeploymentValidator} which can either perform additional validation or enforce

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * Makes it possible to register a custom CDI context.

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * Makes it possible to programmatically modify qualifiers on an injection point.
          
          
            
             * Make it possible to programmatically modify qualifiers on an injection point.
